我喜欢的是以前的杀鸡，是那段大家都沉浸在良好游戏氛围里的杀鸡，人类有真正的无敌房，被抱就可以打击，秒回复的针，秒亮的齿轮，有新月花束，可以玩拆迁流，压机流；屠夫有倒地处决，有5飞护士，可以抱摔骗打击；有着按照段位进行匹配的机制；变态的技能机制组合也没能阻止我们享受游戏带来的快乐，我们崇拜着1段人皇，屠皇，而不是现在单靠时间就能到达的映红段，我们喜欢感受刺激的追逐，而不是现在的黎明竞速，sbmm机制只给我带来了玩人匹配逛街队友，屠夫匹配车队，就算逃生或是4杀给我带来的也尽是颓累感，哪怕之前火衣号被盗也没能阻止我对杀鸡的热爱，因为他依旧是他，但当一切都物是人非之后，我也只能对杀鸡说声再见，嘴边的骂语也只能默默咽下，因为现在的杀鸡早已不是从前的杀鸡了。
“农场主与偷电贼的故事”

This is a nice game! I bought it a while back, didn't understand it, and uninstalled it. I reinstalled it, started playing, and I am borderline addicted to it. This game has:

Strategy, teamwork, numerous maps that change each time, numerous characters, skill trees, familiar stuff like Saw, Scream, Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Silent Hill (the movie), even Hellraiser. 

It's fun! One of the best coop games I have ever played.

Rampant hacker problem that they have for the better part of two years refused to do anything about, facts are that most of the player base will tell you that no, hackers are rare, they are using "Gamer Instinct" and blah blah blah.  Most of those people don't know the basic fundamentals of this game.  Right now I'm posting this because I died in a match, left, and am now sitting here with a 15 minute disconnect timer despite well not disconnecting, but we are going to go into this.  When this game works, it works fabulously, when it doesn't it is a sopping mess of toxic players who can perform the most basic of game functions and pat themselves on the back.  As for hacks, these range from insanely obvious movespeed hacks where people go 50x faster than normal, to slight movespeed hacks only kicking things up between 5-20%, Wallhacking is nearly omnipresent, people hacking in specific perks onto an existing build so you play against people with anywhere from 4-I don't know if this has a cap, Permanently destroying hooks, teleporting, insta popping generators, auto healing, terror radius manipulation, and I'm sure I'm probably forgetting some, but these are all that I have personally encountered.  See one of the main problems is, is that alot of the people cheating in the game try to hide it, like playing Wraith when they choose to speed hack because it makes him harder to see, or feathering movespeed to where Oh they just somehow got just a little bit out of your swing.  Its hard to catch.  But not that hard.  Information is the life and soul of this game, knowing where people are, what they are doing is one of the strongest abilities in this game.  This game very strongly controls that flow of information, and accidentally finding the last survivor on a map despite them just being somewhere that the killer has no actual reason to believe them to be, ignoring the only objectives, turning and B lining it to the hatch from well outside of its audio range...... It happens alot.  These Magical little accidents of "Oh I'm just going to happen to look in this place"  Does this happen for real, Yeah, is it likely?  Nah.  There can be anywhere from dozens to hundreds of places to hide, and outside of information based abilities or perks You could be left with literally no idea where someone is.  Sometimes a lack of information is Information but it is rarely ever pinpoint.  Sadly for the killer half of cheaters their first person.  Which lets you see exactly where they are looking, if they are actually searching or if their camera is locked onto you and they are just, oh I'm going to search closer to you, and then OOPS I found you.  Oh right Aim bots, those are a thing but rare.  From Balance, to map design, this game has needed a lot of work for years, is it still fun Yes, I have almost 500 hours on pc over 1k on ps4(Where hackers were more of a problem), Finding builds, testing things, tweaking them, mastering certain parts of this game are true delights, I wish I was less observant and could just go along with things, but nope.  Am I going to keep playing probably, have I spent over 200 dollars on this game definitely.  Is this a rambling mess.  Also yes.  But at least someone warned you on the way in.

I can not in good conscience recommend this game. It has a lot of good qualities such as art direction, engaging gameplay, etc... The issues however outweigh the positives. Extremely toxic community, bugs everywhere, rampant hacker problem, and even if you want to win at the game, you need to act just as toxic. This game is no longer fun to play, which is a shame because the formula is there. If you are deciding to buy the game or not, I would stay away. It is not worth the money or the stress.

The game is easy enough to pick up, but after playing for a while it is a noob stomper. MMR pretty much promises a bad time and the main currency has little value and is hard to earn if you dont have the right perks and offerings. Not to mention many of the players are extremely toxic and obnoxious. Save yourself from the total agony of this game and skip it, you'll thank me later.
